title: Create BRAND-has-car-model Relationship
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to be able to connect CAR MODELs to a BRAND\
So I can create car families
description:
* The relationship ›has-car-model‹ is created when the provided IDs of the BRAND and CAR MODEL are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship and the IDs of both nodes.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›has-car-model‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* Each BRAND can be in a ›has-car-model‹ relationship with multiple CAR MODELS
